Detailed Description

Subclass to HttpParserThreadGroup that creates XMLParserThreads.

Definition at line 27 of file XMLParserThreadGroup.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

XMLParserThreadGroup::XMLParserThreadGroup (  bool  hostnameLookups = false,
const char *  httplogFilename = NULL,
const char *  threadGroupName = "XMLInterfaceParserThreadGroup",
uint32  minNbrThreads = 5,
uint32  maxNbrThreads = 20,
uint32  queueFullFactor = 3,
uint32  queueOverFullFactor = 3
) 
 

Creates a new XMLParserThreadGroup.

Parameters:
hostnameLookups Log the names of client hosts or just their IP addresses e.g., myhost.com (true) or 213.141.145.151 (false).
httplogFilename The name of the http logfile, if NULL then the Property HTTP_LOG is used if not such property then the default "http.log" is used.
threadGroupName The name of the group.
minNbrThreads The lowest number of parserthreads.
maxNbrThreads The highest number of parserthreads.
queueFactor See InterfaceParserThreadGroup.
queueOverFullFactor See InterfaceParserThreadGroup.
